name: Thermo Kiruna Mid Shell Waterproof - Men's

features: M Select™ DRY BARRIER impermeable membrane seals out water and lets moisture escape
Second lace option (one pop color, one tonal color)
200 grams M Select™ WARM lightweight, low bulk over-the-toe insulation keeps you comfortable where you need it most
Heat-reflecting insole radiates body heat back toward the foot
Kinetic Fit™ BASE removable contoured insole for flexible support
EVA foam midsole for stability and comfort
M Select™ GRIP outsole tunes each outsole with durable traction that grips when and where you need it
